heading: HB00510
0: AN ACT PROVIDING PRE-EMPLOYMENT PRIVILEGE TO INDIGENTS BY GRANTING DISCOUNT ON FEES IN SECURING PRE-EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATIONS AND CLEARANCES FROM GOVERNMENT AGENCIES
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00510
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING PRE-EMPLOYMENT PRIVILEGE TO INDIGENTS BY GRANTING DISCOUNT ON FEES IN SECURING PRE-EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATIONS AND CLEARANCES FROM GOVERNMENT AGENCIES
SHORT TITLE : Indigents Pre-employment Privilege Act
ABSTRACT : Grants twenty percent (20%) discount to indigent job applicants on fees charged by government agencies in the processing of clearances.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (011 2016-08-16)2. Tan (A.) (073 2017-02-21)
3. Batocabe (000 2017-10-03)4. Tambunting (000 2018-09-03)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2016-07-27
